survey_name: Home Office Setup and Productivity Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how professionals set up their home offices and how these setups impact their productivity and comfort.

questions.question_text: How many hours per day do you typically work from your home office?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover common work durations.

script.question_text: How many hours per day do you typically work from your home office?

questions.question_text: Which of the following home office equipment do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option to capture unique setups.

script.question_text: Which of the following home office equipment do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the comfort of your home office setup?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How would you rate the comfort of your home office setup?

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when working from your home office?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when working from your home office?

questions.question_text: Do you have a dedicated room for your home office?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question. Use radio buttons for clarity.

script.question_text: Do you have a dedicated room for your home office?

questions.question_text: How often do you take breaks during your workday?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question with clear time intervals. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you take breaks during your workday?

questions.question_text: Which of the following distractions affect your productivity while working from home? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Social media or personal phone use
questions.client_notes: Multi-select question. Include an 'Other' option for additional distractions.

script.question_text: Which of the following distractions affect your productivity while working from home? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Social media or personal phone use

questions.question_text: How has your productivity changed since working from home?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure perceived productivity change.

script.question_text: How has your productivity changed since working from home?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to make to your home office setup?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather suggestions for improvements.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to make to your home office setup?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your current home office setup to others?
questions.client_notes: Simple recommendation question with three options for nuance.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your current home office setup to others?
